General.Name: Guizhou Space Appliance Co Ltd
General.Description: Guizhou Space Appliance Co., LTD engages in the development, production, and sale of connectors, micro-motors, relays, optoelectronic and optical communication devices, and cable assemblies in China. Its products are used in aerospace, aviation, electronics, communications, weapons, ships, rail transit, energy equipment, and other industries. The company was founded in 2001 and is based in Guiyang, China.
General.Address: Guiyang Economic & Technological Dev Zn, Guiyang, China, 550009
